mapper.insert: INSERT INTO W_WILLOW ( sender_no, receiver_no, state ) VALUES ( #{sender_no}, #{receiver_no}, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT W_WILLOW.sender_no AS sender_no, W_WILLOW.receiver_no AS receiver_no, W_WILLOW.state AS state, M_USER.id AS receiver_id, M_USER.school AS receiver_school, M_USER.gender AS receiver_gender FROM W_WILLOW INNER JOIN M_USER ON W_WILLOW.receiver_no = M_USER.seq WHERE W_WILLOW.sender_no = #{userId}
